languages.text: {n}Регина улыбается одновременно победно и польщенно.{/n} "Не смею расчитывать на столь щедрый знак внимания, Ваша Светлость".
{n}Regina smiles, triumphant and flattered.{/n} "I daren't count on such generous courtesy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: {n}Регина улыбается одновременно победно и польщенно.{/n} "Не смею расчитывать на столь щедрый знак внимания, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: {n}Regina smiles both triumphantly and flattered.{/n} "I daren't count on such a generous courtesy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
{n}Regina smiles both triumphantly and flattered.{/n} "I daren't count on such a generous courtesy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
{n}Regina smiles both triumphantly and flattered.{/n} "I daren't count on such a generous courtesy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
{n}Regina smiles, triumphant and flattered.{/n} "I daren't count on such generous courtesy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
{n}Regina smiles, triumphant and flattered.{/n} "I daren't count on such generous courtesy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: {n}Flattée, Régina vous sourit d'un air triomphant.{/n} « Je n'oserais compter sur une telle courtoisie de votre part, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Regina smiles, triumphant and flattered.{/n} "I daren't count on such generous courtesy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Flattée, Régina vous sourit d'un air triomphant.{/n} « Je n'oserais compter sur une telle courtoisie de votre part, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}蕾吉娜露出得意的媚笑。{/n}“如此慷慨的礼遇令人受宠若惊，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Regina smiles, triumphant and flattered.{/n} "I daren't count on such generous courtesy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}蕾吉娜露出得意的媚笑。{/n}“如此慷慨的礼遇令人受宠若惊，大人。”

languages.text: {n}Regina lächelt triumphal und geschmeichelt.{/n} "Ich hatte es nicht gewagt, auf eine solche Großzügigkeit zu hoffen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}Regina smiles, triumphant and flattered.{/n} "I daren't count on such generous courtesy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Regina lächelt triumphal und geschmeichelt.{/n} "Ich hatte es nicht gewagt, auf eine solche Großzügigkeit zu hoffen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: {n}Regina sonríe triunfante y halagada.{/n} «No esperaba contar con tal amabilidad, {mf|milord|milady}».
languages.original_text: {n}Regina smiles, triumphant and flattered.{/n} "I daren't count on such generous courtesy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Regina sonríe triunfante y halagada.{/n} «No esperaba contar con tal amabilidad, {mf|milord|milady}».

languages.text: {n}レジーナは誇らしく光栄だというように微笑む。{/n}「そのような大層なご厚意は受けられませんわ、陛下」
languages.original_text: {n}Regina smiles, triumphant and flattered.{/n} "I daren't count on such generous courtesy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}レジーナは誇らしく光栄だというように微笑む。{/n}「そのような大層なご厚意は受けられませんわ、陛下」

languages.text: {n}Regina, zafer kazanmış ve pohpohlanmış bir edayla gülümsüyor.{/n} "Buna meyledecek olmanız bile çok büyük bir incelik {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: {n}Regina smiles, triumphant and flattered.{/n} "I daren't count on such generous courtesy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Regina, zafer kazanmış ve pohpohlanmış bir edayla gülümsüyor.{/n} "Bunu teklif etmeniz bile çok büyük bir incelik {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
